message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.DC, cs.SI

The paper discusses the danger of Botnet-based DDoS attacks on the application layer, especially on the Web server, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The attacks also affect network infrastructure (cs.NI) and software engineering (cs.SE) as they limit resources and yield customer dissatisfaction. The paper also discusses the need for efficient defense mechanisms, which falls under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC) and systems and control (cs.SI).
